reviews.title: Great service, but better interest on savings elsewhere
reviews.text: Great service, but better interest on savings elsewhere

reviews.title: Savings account.
reviews.text: As a member with a savings account, I would expect to be notified when a new account is launched which is similar to my account and which pays a higher interest rate.

reviews.title: Customer service
reviews.text: I use the Dudley branch and staff always helpful and friendly.I visited today and was dealt with swiftly and friendly manor by Brenda.always a pleasure to go there

reviews.title: good interest rates
reviews.text: good interest ratesI did experience problems and delays with changing nominated bank account, and problems with the automatic logging out off the account on line without warning

reviews.title: Called in to deposit a cheque into a savings account.
reviews.text: Called in to deposit a cheque into a savings account.

reviews.title: AN Excellent Service all round
reviews.text: From the moment I opened my savings account I have had nothing but excellent service. I needed to query what evidence of identity was acceptable and phoned and was met by courtesy and professionalism. I have no hesitation in recommending this building society to others and have in fact already done so to a close friend.
Missing information not passed on to me as a customer. I was also sent outdated interest rate information - it was not even valid. The information given needs to be 100% accurate but is not.

reviews.title: Dudley Building Society Branch Review
reviews.text: Carol - advised, and served very efficiently by Jane and Carol.

reviews.title: Opening 2yr Saving Bond
reviews.text: I've had a few problems but your staff have been very helpful. Unusually, as a new personal customer I wished to open a 2 year savings bond but this was complicated by the fact that I was also the nominated person for Charity Trustee account. My online application for a personal saving bond repeatedly failed and I only could discover the reason for this when I contacted your staff. I found your online on-line log off after 120 seconds inconveniently short – have you considered extending this to say 5-minutes as typically used by banks? Lastly it seems I have to use same email address for both personal account and charity account - far from satisfactory. Inspite of above all sorted now (apart from email problem) Regards Keith

reviews.title: Great to be dealt with by competent people
reviews.text: Well I know the Dudley people pretty well but dealing with them as a customer puts everything you already know into perspective. They are clear, knowledgeable and competent.

reviews.title: Happy
reviews.text: Excellent service. Friendly, professional staff. No queues - Absolute Bonus!!!

reviews.title: First class service
reviews.text: I was listened to. I got all the help I needed and more. I felt so reassuring to speak to someone who really understood my problem. So fantastic to be able to pick up a phone and speak to someone who cares about their customers. I felt as if my call mattered. Excellent service .

reviews.title: Registering online
reviews.text: Very pleased to now be able to access my accounts online and be able to make changes as I need. It’s not always easy to come into branch.

reviews.title: ISA ADVICE
reviews.text: Excellent service as usual. Appreciate being able to see people face to face to discuss financial matters in a local location.

reviews.title: Great friendly staff
reviews.text: It's always a pleasure to visit the branch and speak to a real person. The ladies in the Gornal branch are wonderful.

reviews.title: Great customer service
reviews.text: Always thorough with security and very helpful customer service

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.text: Staff always very helpful and very welcoming

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.text: Couldn’t of been more helpful. Very satisfied.

reviews.title: Dudley branch review
reviews.text: Very helpful - Paid cheque in envelope for me

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: The staff are very friendly and helpful,

reviews.title: Friendly h greatelpful
reviews.text: Pleasant great service have been with dbs for about 25 years or more

reviews.title: Dudley intermediaries
reviews.text: terrible service levels. 3 days of constant ringing and leaving messages with no call back!

reviews.title: Excellent service!
reviews.text: I’ve been with with Building Society for years, they’ve never let me down!

reviews.title: Service
reviews.text: Excellent service and very helpful staff

reviews.title: Depositing cheque and withdrawing money.
reviews.text: On my visit the transactions were handled courteously and effectively by a very pleasant assistant

reviews.title: Review
reviews.text: Other members of the public without face mask on in branch. Clearly says on door face covering should be worn.

reviews.title: Very friendly staff
reviews.text: I was dealt with very quickly and effiecently

reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
reviews.text: I have been with Dudley Building Society for around 25 years because they offer a very competitive savings rates and excellent customer service!

reviews.title: Regular Savings
reviews.text: This scheme is easy to join The staff are helpful with the initial admin Once the standing order is set up I can forget about. The savings rate is better than many of the competitors

reviews.title: Quick and effective
reviews.text: Claire was helpful and quick to sort my query out

reviews.title: Online Access
reviews.text: Attempted online access to a passbook account and finally successful after many messages to the Society about failing to access to see my account. Staff suggested using a different browser, which did the trick. Thanks to patient staff dealing with my frustrations.

reviews.title: Good people despite the limited resources and good response from them
reviews.text: Had some difficulty getting into the account but all ok now and my thanks to the staff who helped me . Thanks Emma & Laura

reviews.title: Online access
reviews.text: I was unhappy not to able to access my investment online but now, thank goodness, it has been made possible.

reviews.title: Perton branch review
reviews.text: Very pleased and friendly service.

reviews.title: Gornal Wood branch review
reviews.text: Service - friendliness. Less paperwork, professionalism

reviews.title: We wanted someone with the knowledge to look at our current pension situation.
reviews.text: David was very helpful and happy to look at our overall situation.

reviews.title: Very helpful and friendly
reviews.text: Recently had a consultation with Mr Roger Dutton, Financial Adviser, arranged via Dudley Building Society at their Gornal branch. Very useful meeting with lots of good advice and with no 'hard selling' at all.

reviews.title: Financial Advisor
reviews.text: I was recommended to speak to Financial Advisor, Roger Dutton, regarding planning for retirement. He contacted me quickly and arranged to meet at a time that was convenient to me. He arrived punctually, and was friendly and knowledgeable, he gave me good advice with clear explanations. A good service.

reviews.title: PENSION ADVICE
reviews.text: Roger Dutton arrived on time. He was very pleasant and easy to get along with. We can't thank him enough for the advice he gave to us , it was very informative and very helpful. Thank you

reviews.title: Good advice received
reviews.text: Respected my decisions. Listened carefully to my situation and what I was trying to achieve. Gave an option I would not have thought about and which suited me moving forward.

reviews.title: Highly Recommend
reviews.text: Financial Advisor was patient and understanding with cautious first time investors. Gave clear and knowledgeable advice. We did not feel rushed to make decisions. We would highly recommend.

reviews.title: Very likely
reviews.text: Always friendly and very helpful in advice very clear too

reviews.title: Dudley Branch review
reviews.text: The feedback I got from the C.S.A lady was fantastic and I would recommend my friends to join Dudley Building Society

reviews.title: David Kemp Financial Adviser
reviews.text: I was very pleased with the adviser Dudley Building Society arranged for me , David Kemp was very knowledgeable and he answer all the issues I was concern with and I would be happy to use him for future financial advise should I need it.

reviews.title: Financial advice
reviews.text: Delighted in the service given and would recomend this to anyone looking for finacial advice.

reviews.title: caring
reviews.text: i had to open new account today it was very easy and the staff member was nice

reviews.title: EXCELLENT PERSONAL SERVICE
reviews.text: The staff are always wishing to improve the services offered and superb with our mortgage, life assurance and were competitive with our home insurance. Thank you for remaining our local financial service.

reviews.title: Perton Branch Review
reviews.text: Since your alteration nothing else required

reviews.title: Member Review
reviews.text: Very good and friendly staff. But better music please!

reviews.title: Fantastically helpful service
reviews.text: I was in a position to pay off my mortgage and phoned for help. I got straight through, the staff member I spoke to was very helpful and sent me all the information I need within a couple of hours. When I was trying to make my payments I encountered a couple of hiccups on my side - nothing to do with Dudley BS - and the email support that I asked for was given quickly, precisely, and was exactly what I needed, and all done with a positive tone. If I’d asked something impossible I think they’d still have tried to make it happen! Fantastic service.

reviews.title: Dudley is the A-Team!
reviews.text: For the onset the team at Dudley are always personable, efficient and responsive and in these days of automated systems it is this attention to detail and understanding that marks Dudley Building Society as an outstanding people driven mortgage provider. Even when our mortgage has been up for renewal the team have been fully engaged in keeping us updated. Can’t fault them. Thank you for Simply being the best! Grace, Hannah and Lily: you are the A-Team!

reviews.title: Flexible and Good Communication
reviews.text: I am a mortgage adviser and work with a lot of Building Societies and Banks and know to expect with each. When a lender is flexible like Dudley BS, they obviously need more information to ensure that they are protecting the customer and the society. Although the process was a bit slow and laborious, the overall service, flexibility and communication was good. I will definitely consider using them again when the need appears.

reviews.title: Very professional service.
reviews.text: Very professional service. Once we provided requested info it was acted on and good results! The team were excellent.

reviews.title: I would like to thank the support of Nav who was exc...
reviews.text: I would like to thank the support of Nav who was excellent and helped me resolve an urgent query in a timely matter and

reviews.title: Allowing more time for repayment on maturity
reviews.text: When the mortgage matured and we needed more time to resolve the best way forward the Dudley team were very helpful and patient. This enabled a satisfactory resolution for both sides.

reviews.title: Excellent customer service
reviews.text: Excellent service from Lilly today, she was extremely helpful and friendly. Went out of her way to help with my queries and answered every question efficiently. She was very understanding, patient and genuine. Lovely experience.

reviews.title: Outstanding from start to finish
reviews.text: From start to finish of our relationship with Dudley BS, their service has been outstanding. All the people we dealt with - whether over the phone (it was nice at times to still be able to pick up the phone and speak to a person to quickly clarify/sort an issue) or via email were polite, efficient and knowledgeable. Communication was first rate. Products were competitive and clearly explained.

reviews.title: Mortgage review explanation.
reviews.text: I spoke to a member of the customer service team. Lilly, was exceptionally knowledgeable and helpful with my enquiry. So helpful and made what can be a confusing conversation to have if your experience in the mortgage sector is below the normal, her approach in dealing with any question i asked was one of a clear and precise explanation without any confusion. Most definitely a credit to your team. An excellent experience of calling my mortgage provider.

reviews.title: Re Mortgage enquiry
reviews.text: I spoke with Nav today. I had a lot of questions for her regarding our Mortgage, she answered all of my questions and was really helpful. She went over and above to make sure she gave me all the correct information. Thank you Nav

reviews.title: A highly professional but helpful experience
reviews.text: The advisor I spoke to had complete and (ready) knowledge of the request. They were very welcoming in answering all the question and when needed, I had to request for more info, which I was instantly provided. The advisor kept their words as I needed an email with certain information to respond to the Building Society. At no point, did I feel the advisor was in a rush and wanted me to leave the line. What struck me most was that the advisor actually, helped me by giving bits of info, which I might have gotten otherwise after a few more calls, but the advisor was kind and pointed out what my options were. So really very happy with the call. Were I to give her marks, I would go for 10/10.

reviews.title: All dealings with our mortgage have been dealt with...
reviews.text: All dealings with our mortgage have been dealt with in a efficent, considerate and friendly manner. We have nothing but highest praise for the service provided by Dudley Building Society

reviews.title: Big shout out to girls in the mortgage dept ...
reviews.text: Big shout out to girls in the mortgage office particularly Caroline and Clare . But to be fair, the Building Society generally in the way they handled a very difficult and sensitive situation . The capital sum was due to be paid off in November of last year but the property was in the midst of bitter court proceedings between myself and my ex and there was much unexpected delay . I was fearful throughout that Dudley could repossess - as was their contractual right but instead they handled the whole situation with kindness , sensitivity and flexibility . It took six further months to resolve and now at least we will walk away with something . Thank you Dudley . Really . You avoided turning a drama into a crisis

reviews.title: The operator was very polite and well mannered and s...
reviews.text: The operator was very polite and well mannered and she put me at ease and answered my questions

reviews.title: Excellent service
reviews.text: Dudley Building Society have been excellent with their service for me, especially Claire who has helped and supported me so much

reviews.title: We had financial difficulties and I dealt with Clair...
reviews.text: We had financial difficulties and I dealt with Claire, she was fantastic and so understanding, she allowed us to pay a percentage of our monthly payment while we sold our property.. eventually it was sold and we managed to pay the balance of the mortgage off. Claire was invaluable to us so thank you Claire and the Dudley Building Society for helping us through a very difficult time.

reviews.title: In branch service review
reviews.text: Friendly services, accepted us for our mortgage when others didn't.

reviews.title: I asked for a lot of lot information going back seve...
reviews.text: I asked for a lot of lot information going back several years. All provided very quickly.

reviews.title: Extremely helpful
reviews.text: Called up for some advice as I wanted to change my payment date. Rebecca was extremely helpful, informative and the company offer a good amount of flexibility which is refreshing.

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.text: We have had mortgages with dbs for over 30 years, they have been amazing.

reviews.title: Great interaction ,very pleasent,knowledge was clear...
reviews.text: Great interaction ,very pleasent,knowledge was clear and all round good customer service

reviews.title: I have held my mortgage with Dudley Building Society...
reviews.text: I have held my mortgage with Dudley Building Society for a significant period of time and have had excellent service throughout and today when I was enquiring about final repayment of the mortgage

reviews.title: mortgage
reviews.text: Dudley have been great help. Claire is fab.

reviews.title: Support ex-pat customers
reviews.text: As a company that specialises in mortgages for ex-pat then it is essential that they have access to internet banking for many reasons: hours are not convenient, it is expensive to phone, phone calls can be missed, texts are not delivered.

reviews.title: Excellent fast response to our enquiry
reviews.text: Excellent fast response to our enquiry

reviews.title: Due to circumstances the society have been able to s...
reviews.text: Due to circumstances the society have been able to support us through a difficult time and we are grateful to Claire for all the assistance she has given to us.

reviews.title: The repaymnt rates have been manageable
reviews.text: The repaymnt rates have been manageable

reviews.title: Overall helpful and fit for purpose.
reviews.text: Overall helpful and fit for purpose. So glad I found them !

reviews.title: Mortgage redemption
reviews.text: Just been in the fortunate position to pay off my mortgage. What a seamless and easy process. Shout out to Caroline for all her help.

reviews.title: Large new self build mortgage
reviews.text: Dudley have worked with us on a large new build and Laura McGinn specifically has been a beacon of professionalism, organisation, communication and customer care. She could not have been better, which is the highest praise I could offer.

reviews.title: Great customer service, always so happy to help and...
reviews.text: Great customer service, always so happy to help and so informative and patient.

reviews.title: Staff great, business poor. Avoid
reviews.text: The staff and desire to help is second to none, clearly well trained customer facing staff. However the internal processes and infrastructure is abysmally poor. Took us many months to confirm our mortgage deal, and 32 pieces of CDD to verify it. From then, overpayments follow an overly complicated process. I complained to the Ombudsman about our take-on, they ruled in our favour 6 months ago and recommended Dudley make payment. Since then, Dudley simply refuse to make payment, and are using every trick in the book to dodge their duties. Great staff, really poor running of their business. Would avoid at all costs given the competitive market and many other mtg providers. Not worth the hassle.

reviews.title: Kind and helpful service.
reviews.text: Kind and helpful service. Easily assisted me with my query and informed me of what I needed to do.

reviews.title: I have been dealing mainly with Claire, who is incre...
reviews.text: I have been dealing mainly with Claire, who is incredibly professional and easy to speak to. Can't thank her enough for her support actually.

reviews.title: Fantastic customer service always
reviews.text: They were so helpful with my first ever mortgage and now the renewal too. Always there to explain things to you in simple, easy to understand terms without judgment and without automatic robots on the phone lines!

reviews.title: Friendly, knowledgeable and expedient.
reviews.text: Friendly, knowledgeable and expedient. Exceeded my expectation dealing with my transaction.

reviews.title: Equity Redemption
reviews.text: I found Claire to be very helpful with the matter of my late mothers equity redemption she was very professional and explained clearly the things that I had to do. I would gladly recommend anyone who wanted to use their resources

reviews.title: Mortgage broker
reviews.text: It took a long time to get documents reviewed however i like the system

reviews.title: Solution Found
reviews.text: Not the cheapest on the market but have great niche products.

reviews.title: Excellent Service
reviews.text: We had a few problems started speaking with Claire Sanders for help and advice.. The commitment from Claire was fantastic as she sorted everything out with kindness understanding and correct advice.. if not for Claire we would have lost the property.. THANK YOU CLAIRE

reviews.title: 'A Griffin Savings like' mortgage lender
reviews.text: I am a mortgage admin and I have had a case in since 14th June- the service is slow, the portal has requirements from 2 other banks that are unrelated to the case and apart from James Green, the helplines have been terrible and seem to not want to help The case is agreed subject to val - val report is fine however it has taken over 15 days to get picked up. For document requirements to be reviewed it takes 12+ working days even if it is only a reply to an enquiry. Overall if you need an offer in 2 months- this is not the place. A shame

reviews.title: Genuinely - the worst
reviews.text: Where to start, deal with this half baked, wholly incompetent, bone-idle company at your peril. A simple re-mortgage, of a BTL property with LTV of 60%, proven equity, a two-year AST lease with stable income and two owners with stable jobs an demonstrable incomes has taken 5 months to complete. Why? Because Dudley have shown incompetence to another level, leaving us stuck paying a sky-high SVR on our existing product for 3 months. At each step, they have failed to understand, asked for extra information, misplaced and lost documents, asked the same question multiple times, failed to update us on case progress and shown all round incompetence of which I have never encountered before. I can go into so much more detail, and have to the Ombudsman and my local MP, but am limited to a word count on this box. Long story short - avoid, avoid, avoid. Worth paying a higher rate and fixing with another provider.

reviews.title: Extremely happy with 10 years of great service
reviews.text: I have just cleared my mortgage and not stress how happy I have been with the service provided from my first dealings right to the last where I was helped by Grace and as usual it was friendly, polite and efficient

reviews.title: Treating Customers fairly??!!
reviews.text: Appalling treatment of existing customer who has been trying to switch her mortgage onto a new repayment method nearly 2 months ago, Poor communication from the lender and still no indication of how long this will take? in the meantime the customer is being putting in a negative financial situation.

reviews.title: Re-mortgage made easy
reviews.text: Such helpful and friendly company, never had a problem and all questions I didn’t understand made simple . Thank you

reviews.title: Professional
reviews.text: Very professional service, friendly and knowledgeable staff

reviews.title: Very efficient and friendly service
reviews.text: I always receive a fast and helpful reply to my questions.

reviews.title: Fantastic customer service, very very helpful and help in so many ways, and so easy to talk to, i cant i would nog be in my property without their help and support, and thsnk them so much
reviews.text: Fantastic builfing society, so very friendly and so understanfing, cant reccomend enough so happy we're with dudley building society thank you so much

reviews.title: I was working abroad and the Dudley could not have been more helpful
reviews.text: I was able to keep in contact at all times even though I was in the Middle East and I was able to secure a mortgage over 3 years which was perfect as it finished just before I retired

reviews.title: Do not use! 16 weeks and still no offer
reviews.text: DO NOT USE! If I could give 0 star I would. If you value your mental health please do not use Dudley Building Society. After paying an almost £500 fee for a mortgage application (which so many other mortgage lenders do not require) and being reassured by them (and stated on their website) that their lead time for application was 6 weeks, after weeks of chasing, bad communication, mistakes on their part, 16 weeks after my application was submitted, still no mortgage offer despite my broker providing everything required. It was a week before I was due to exchange and still no offer so went with another lender who were excellent and turned an offer round in less than a week. It took Dudley 8 weeks to instruct a valuation and 8 weeks later there was still no valid report due to errors on their and the surveyors part. They do not respond to complaints simply 'reject' them. I actually believe them taking a fee and not proving the service in the timescales stated in the original communication and on their website is not only in breach of the consumer act, but is also fraud. Please do not use them, please do not hand over your money to them. The constant chasing, the constant 'you will have it next week' is mentally draining and has caused me so much anxiety and stress (which they do not care about) I wouldn't want anyone else to do through that.

reviews.title: Friendly and supportive
reviews.text: Claire Sanders was amazing today. I am an existing customer needing help with a move and she really helped with solutions and not just words. Makes me happy to be with Dudley and will always recommend. Thank you Claire

reviews.title: Friendly and community spirited
reviews.text: We have had a mortgage now with the society for nearly thirty years and I have to speak as I find, they are amazing, through the tough times, we have had a few, they listen, advise and they treat you with respect and kindness as much as if You were about to deposit a million pound. Thank you so much to Claire Sanders, Gemma and Laura and the team Jane

reviews.title: Great service and very understanding every time , take time with any issue
reviews.text: My experience has been great with Dudley Building society they have supported me in a very big way and each time took time listening to me please please have your mortgages with Dudley building society you dont need to struggle great proffesional who will listen and guide you too .

reviews.title: Help with mortgage areas
reviews.text: Claire sandres has been very helpful and supportive. I have been going through financial and medical difficulties Claire has guided me through the process and her advice has really helped not just financially but mentally too.

reviews.title: The Worst Lender EVER
reviews.text: Avoid Dudley at all costs!! 2 months down the line and still no further forward, I work for a broker and have dealt with hundreds of lenders over 6 years, but Dudley is by far the worst I have ever dealt with.

reviews.title: Absolutely shocking
reviews.text: Took 2 months to respond to a request to re-finance. Hiked up the monthyl repayments by 18% without explanation.

reviews.title: Poor underwriting process
reviews.text: The society has massive delays on underwriting mortgages. The excuse is low staffing. They also change timescales without warning.

reviews.title: A Customer Friendly Society
reviews.text: A friendly, helpful workforce. Very knowledgeable operatives on the phone. Very clear information when circumstances change. Good informative website, although sometimes difficult to access.

reviews.title: Disappointed service
reviews.text: I have a expat mortgage with DBS and the incompetent staff who don’t listen and action what I’m asking for. I want to switch my mortgage and it’s taking ages to complete due to the poor communication and listening skills.

reviews.title: Good criteria generally
reviews.text: Generally good, but today I have been on hold on two occasions and after 10 minutes asked to leave a message as no-one available and I would get a call back. Call-backs are not being actioned. BDM out of office and mortgage sales email gets a return message saying will respond within 5 days. This is not great service, when you cant speak to anyone at all. Not been my experience with Dudley or regional lenders in the past so quite disappointing.

reviews.title: Self build mortgage
reviews.text: Dudley have been entirely professional and supportive through a complex self build; they literally helped me to keep my project on track

reviews.title: mortgage processing
reviews.text: easy system to use and very quick on agreeing cases

reviews.title: An Amazing Building Society
reviews.text: Been with Dudley for over three years now. I must say they were the only one willing to take a risk on me. Thank you Dudley

reviews.title: rescue service
reviews.text: At a time when as pensioners we needed help, the Dudley Building society came to our rescue,,, a Society that cares

reviews.title: Time wasters
reviews.text: Awful experience - complete waste of time. Lack of communication made it impossible to know if there was any progress - they clearly had no intention of sticking to the Mortgage in Principle they gave us.

reviews.title: Mortgage
reviews.text: Dudley building society gave us a mortgage when no other would so for that alone I applaud them . Amazing service

reviews.title: Excellent personal service
reviews.text: The Dudley are very easy to contact. I never have to wait on hold in a long queue, the phone is always answered by a person straight away. They listened well to our personal situation when severely affected by COVID and with their flexibility we were able to come through it. If they want to get hold of us they will phone, unlike other companies who send a txt asking you to phone them, which usually involves a length wait time on hold. Being phoned by the company is much better. I would definitely recommend the Dudley building society.

reviews.title: Poor Support
reviews.text: Faced with an issue of needing to reset my password I contacted the Help Desk. I explained that the reset password link was not generating an email. The canned response was that I should use the reset password link….

reviews.title: Will never utilize Dudley again and encourage others to avoid
reviews.text: Since obtaining an mortgage with Dudley, my customer experience has been very far from satisfactory. Dudley does not put the customer first and is very limited with communications or advice. I have wasted a lot of time and money being with this provider and have learnt the hard way. Beware....

reviews.title: Fantastic service wonderful team
reviews.text: I have had a mortgage for many years with the Dudley, and they have always been informative, courteous, helpful and so easy to talk to, finger on the pulse, up to date information, I trust them fully to be fair and manage my affairs with transparency. All the staff are lovely and friendly, so when I finish my mortgage next month I intend to use the Dudley to invest my savings with an e account, thanks again for all your help you are truly a great team

reviews.title: Friendly and effective customer service
reviews.text: After being locked out of my account due to technical issues I rang up DBS and spoke to Brenda. Brenda was very friendly and reassuring. She helped direct my query to the appropriate department to resolve my technical issue and gave me some guidance on another query that I had regarding a mortgage account.

reviews.title: Kingswinford branch review
reviews.text: Allowed my family lifetime discout off my first mortagge (0.5%( for the term (in 1986), motivated us to stay with society when moved twice after that

reviews.title: Good All Rounder
reviews.text: Dudley are a great lender with niches that other lenders dont have. Great for expat.

reviews.title: Safe, steady, and responsive
reviews.text: Dudley is easy to deal with. The online service now makes seeing status & balances much easier and still with that friendly tough

reviews.title: Helped us when most needed
reviews.text: We were really pleased Dudley could help us with our mortgage

reviews.title: Very helpful underwriting with Dudley BS
reviews.text: You can get all support with your case from beginning to the completion.

reviews.title: Nice building society nice people
reviews.text: Gemma was professional and friendly and dealt with my request for information about my mortgage in a confident and knowledgable way.

reviews.title: New online facility
reviews.text: Bit disappointed in your new on line facility. I was hoping there would be some more tools you could use especially in making repayments on your mortgage if you wanted an idea how much you can make overpayments and what effect this will have to the outstanding balance. It has very limited use to the customer apart from telling you the outstanding balance. I think if you want more customers to use it additional tools needed to be added.

reviews.title: Taking the risk
reviews.text: When I was looking for a lender to help me buy my flat, Dudley was prepared to do so when so many others had turned me down. I am thankful they took a risk to help me out. I have recently renewed my mortgage with Dudley for the next 5 years.

reviews.title: Product suitability excellent customer service
reviews.text: Offered mortgage when other societies not doing so for over 60+. Succinct easy to understand information on phone & in writing. Competitive rates. Prompt efficient professional yet friendly staff/ customer service. Thank you

reviews.title: An excellent service
reviews.text: DBS have provided a excellent service that has enabled us to be on the property ladder, within a short period of time

reviews.title: Dudley your the best.
reviews.text: Great products and service. Friendly ans supportive staff. More than a bank, building a community through providing great all-round service.

reviews.title: Excellent all round service
reviews.text: As a .Ex Pat applying for a buy to let mortgage Dudley helped me with my application with very little fuss Also excellent customer service and advice

reviews.title: Family supportive Building Society
reviews.text: My family, parents, sisters and nephews have all been members of the Dudley for many years, with savings and.mortgage accounts. The support and service provided over the years has been greatly appreciated, especially through recent challenging times due to COVID. Thank you!!!!!

reviews.title: Dudley Building Society gave me a new lease of life.....
reviews.text: When my original mortgage ran out at age 75 I needed another mortgage to pay off a still outstanding debt. Dudley came to my rescue by offering a repayment mortgage that helped me remain in my own home. I have always found them to be very courteous and caring in my dealings with them. Dudley might be small but they have a BIG Heart and will always be Special To Me.

reviews.title: Offered us a great mortgage
reviews.text: Provided us with a great mortgage and when it came to renewing it was such a quick and easy process with sorting another great deal.

reviews.title: Dudley building society- mortgage application simplicity
reviews.text: What a pleasurable experience from application to the acceptance of our mortgage application. No criticism just praise.

reviews.title: Service with a smile
reviews.text: I have been a member of DBS for a number of years, I have both savings and mortgage products with DBS and always found the service to be informed and very helpful, offering advice with any query or problem I may have.

reviews.title: The understanding Society
reviews.text: When all other options for a mortgage were rejected 5 years ago Dudley came to our rescue and loaned us the money to buy our house.. we have never looked back and thank them for the trust and support.

reviews.title: Poor communication
reviews.text: Poor communication, don’t carry out tasks on time and generally a really poor service - worst I have seen from a bank!

reviews.title: Heylo , self build, ex pat resi
reviews.text: A great specialist lender with various products also their underwriter Chanelle is brilliant at her job

reviews.title: Joint account misogyny
reviews.text: I have always been very pleased with the service I have received at Dudley but one thing that constantly annoys is the fact that although I initially contacted, and have always been the one to contact them as I run the account, they chose to put my husbands name first on our mortgage. I recently joined online. It is my email and phone number on the online service but they wrote (as they always do) to my husband to confirm he had joined online. Why was this not at the least a letter addressed to us both? This is such an outdated and misogynistic practice.

reviews.title: Very responsive and helpful during the recent payment holiday period.
reviews.text: Whilst the application process was ponderous and protracted, they were dealing with a fairly unusual one. We did resent having to give a second charge on our main London home in addition to the property mortgaged.

reviews.title: Super helpful
reviews.text: So helpful during a stressful time buying a house. Great deal offered. No hassle renewing mortgage after the three years.

reviews.title: Friendly and Professional
reviews.text: When I bought my flat nearly 4 years ago, I was very surprised to receive a huge welcome box of goodies from Dudley. This year, my mortgage was up for renewal and I decided to stay with Dudley for another 5 years. It was a pleasure to speak with the staff; they are attentive and helpful in their reply; very patient in answering my many questions; sending information and literature to help me in my decision making. I am very pleased to be their customer.

reviews.title: Nice People To Do Business With....
reviews.text: Three years ago at the age of 75 I applied to Dudley for a mortgage to replace my old one that had expired. Every other building society turned me down because of my age, but Dudley didn’t and their mortgage gave me security of tenure ever since. I will always be grateful to Dudley Building Society and always speak highly of them to my friends because Dudley take a positive approach to mortgages. Thank You!

reviews.title: Strong sense of family and community and being together.
reviews.text: Good service. Kind and friendly staff. Community and people focused. More than a business.

reviews.title: Brilliant attention to personal need
reviews.text: As a self-employed foster carer with many, many miles on the clock, seventy plus in fact, most building societies and banks laughed me out of court. Not so with Dudley. They took the time to look at my needs and my capacity and the attention I received in applying for, and completing, my mortgage was outstanding.

reviews.title: Great people in a fantastic part of the planet
reviews.text: They always want to do the right thing. They're friendly and normal.

reviews.title: The customer service provided by The Dudley is of the highest calibre I ever experienced.
reviews.text: Prompt response to enquiries, understanding of customer needs, nothing any trouble, a comprehensive range of products, nice touch like a gift box sent to my new home

reviews.title: Super steady
reviews.text: A very good service where all queries are answered in a timely and polite way, good communications and recommend this building society whole heartedly.

reviews.title: helpful
reviews.text: great service, and always helpful

reviews.title: Responsive
reviews.text: We were able to quickly get a mortgage. Very helpful in the process

reviews.title: Dudley building society
reviews.text: Dudley have been great, keeping us posted every step through our mortgage

reviews.title: i was unable to set up online
reviews.text: after following the process the message recieved was that i did not have a mobile registered. So i was unable to set up online. Yet i have recieved a letter today welcoming me to the online system. If there is any assistance to set up i would welcome this. regards Mrs Fletcher

reviews.title: Helpful and quick phone response to questions
reviews.text: Easy to sort out problems and queries. Thank uou

reviews.title: Great customer service always.
reviews.text: I have always found the customer service team to be very helpful and happy to help. I have a speech impediment but i am always made to feel comfortable when paying my mortgage over the phone. Can't thank the team enough.

reviews.title: Fantastic friendly society with great criteria.
reviews.text: Flexible underwriting has resulted in a mortgage that I couldn’t of dreamed before.

reviews.title: Excellent Service, highly recommended
reviews.text: I can not praise Dudley's staff and service enough, we have had our Mortgage with them for many years, they have always been so helpful, staff are so professional and very polite and friendly at all times, always willing to help in any situation. I would recommend Dudley to anyone without any hesitation whatsoever. Carry on with good work Dudley and thank you very much.

reviews.title: renewal enquiry
reviews.text: brilliant ... 2 telephone calls both dealt with very polite and friendly and informative i called 2nd time to say my paperwork hadnt arrived to which i was dealt with and a second lot posted ... ten mins after i put the phone down ...the first lot of paperwork arrived (oops me being a bit too keen ) anyway i filled out the paper work ..called the office and dropped it staight down to a lovely lady who i had been talking to on the phone and now i know my renewal is in safe hands thank you for putting up with an awkward customer

reviews.title: Friendly Support
reviews.text: We have held a mortgage with Dudley Building Society for over 15 years. We love the fact that you can always reach an adviser who is friendly, helpful and happy to help. We wouldn’t change providers purely because of the exceptional support you get from the team.

reviews.title: Non standard mortgage
reviews.text: As a borrower who was both 65 and self employed I found the approach of DBS to be refreshingly different to the high st banks who still prefer to lend to younger applicants who are employed

reviews.title: The Dudley deliver a thorough, personal, reliable and quality service.
reviews.text: Post completion I found the Dudley personnel to be helpful, patient and advisory. An excellent service.

reviews.title: Brilliant service
reviews.text: Brilliant service with no hassles and problems. Will surely recommend to my family and friends.

reviews.title: Unlike any other provider
reviews.text: Our application was not run of the mill. It was dealt with quickly and without any problems with updates every step of the way. A lovely surprise was the fantastic hamper we received on moving in to enjoy a lovely cup of tea and goodies. As we say 'Unlike any other provider'

reviews.title: terrible customer service
reviews.text: terrible customer service received, I have spoken too 3 different people with same results. Loyal customer didn't make a difference when going for a mortgage

reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
reviews.text: Took 9 weeks just to issue the mortgage offer.

reviews.title: Tailored product/s efficient courteous service
reviews.text: In 2016, being over 65 but with very good regular pension income & good equity in my home no other building societies would offer a mortgage or re mortgage that I required to help my daughter in financial hardship after marriage break up except Dudley BS via a financial management co. The initial 2yr fixed mortgage matured & Dudley BS provided options to continue with them. I chose a very competitive rate 3 Yr fix. Staff have proved efficient prompt polite helpful in all dealings with society. Process ' hassle free'. Literature/ options & statements clear. I am pleased to offer this very positive endorsement of their products & service.

reviews.title: Registering power of attorney
reviews.text: Very friendly and efficient as always

reviews.title: Staff lovely professional
reviews.text: Really excellent service given today, dealt with lovely advisers , and just spoken to Lorna credit to your company

reviews.title: Checking about bank detail changes
reviews.text: Went through security and had my mind put at rest emedialey as there are so many scams at the moment and I wanted to make sure the email about your bank detail changes were from you knowing it was has put my mind at rest thank you

reviews.title: Excellent service and people who care about people
reviews.text: Excellent service and people who care about people

reviews.title: Opened a regular saver via the post.
reviews.text: Opened a regular saver via the post. All very quick and efficient. Great service.

reviews.title: Setting up the account felt rather old-fashioned...
reviews.text: Setting up the account felt rather old-fashioned with having to get ID verified on paper and completing the application on paper and by post, however, it was all completed and correctly. It would be nice if they could print on the back of the first page of the letter with the second half to save a piece of paper, or perhaps condense the correspondence to the essentials.

reviews.title: Carol Davies,served me and right from the start kind...
reviews.text: Carol Davies,served me and right from the start kindness was shown and nothing was to much trouble,considering it was early Monday morning and I came unannounced.well done.

reviews.title: Savings
reviews.text: Very professional with dealing with my financial problems

reviews.title: Brierley Hill Branch review
reviews.text: Lovely friendly staff. Nothing is too much trouble
